types.html:
à l'étude (invariable)

  1. under study, under review, under consideration, under examination, under evaluation, on the drawing board, in the pipeline
    être à l'étude ― to be under study
trans: under study, under review, under consideration, under examination, under evaluation, on the drawing board, in the pipeline

title: à l'étude
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /a l‿e.tyd/
